Description: Ostracon, fragment from the shoulder section of a pottery vessel, pale-red fabric with a grey core, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text, identifying the contents as year 9 meat, and some traces of red.
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I. Pl. LXIV fig. 75
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393122) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393122)
